member.name: T:Vestcom.Job.Proxy.EofFileOrderComparer
member.summary: Used to compare an enumerable of files and place the "eof" files at the end or the beginning of the list using a eof pattern matching scheme.

member.name: T:Vestcom.Job.Proxy.JobChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides details about a job that has changed phase and/or state.

member.name: M:Vestcom.Job.Proxy.JobChangedEventArgs.#ctor(System.Int32,Vestcom.Job.JobStateTypes,Vestcom.Job.JobPhaseTypes)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of these event arguments.
member.param: The id of the job task that has changed.
The current state of the job task.
The current phase of the job task.

member.name: P:Vestcom.Job.Proxy.JobChangedEventArgs.JobTaskId
member.summary: Gets the id of this job task.

member.name: P:Vestcom.Job.Proxy.JobChangedEventArgs.Phase
member.summary: Gets the current phase.

member.name: P:Vestcom.Job.Proxy.JobChangedEventArgs.State
member.summary: Gets the current state.

member.name: P:Vestcom.Job.Proxy.JobTaskRunOptions.JobChangedHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets the handler used when watching job state changes.

member.name: P:Vestcom.Job.Proxy.JobTaskRunOptions.WaitForCustomBillingFileCompletion
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the process should wait until a custom billing file is completed prior to returning control back to the calling method.

member.name: P:Vestcom.Job.Proxy.JobTaskRunOptions.CustomBillingFileCompletionTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a timeout for waiting on a custom billing file. The default value is 5 minutes.

member.name: P:Vestcom.Job.Proxy.JobTaskRunOptions.CleanDropFolderBeforeRunning
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the drop folder should be cleaned prior to dropping the files.

member.name: P:Vestcom.Job.Proxy.JobTaskRunOptions.RetryFileCopyTimes
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times a file copy operation will retry before failing.

member.summary: Gets all available registered pre-processors.

member.summary: Gets the registered pre-processor for the supplied Job Definition.
member.param: The Id of the Job Definition for which the pre-processor will be retrieved.
member.returns: The PreProcessor instance, or null, if no PreProcessor is registered with the Job Definition.
